history.heading: Equipment designed or modified for anisotropic etching of dielectric materials and enabling the fabrication of high aspect ratio features with aspect ratio greater than 30:1 and a lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 100 nm, and having all of the following:
history.title: Equipment designed or modified for anisotropic etching of dielectric materials and enabling the fabrication of high aspect ratio features with aspect ratio greater than 30:1 and a lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 100 nm, and having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
history.text:
Equipment designed or modified for anisotropic etching of dielectric materials and enabling the fabrication of high aspect ratio features with aspect ratio greater than 30:1 and a lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 100 nm, and having all of the following:
Radio Frequency (RF) power source(s) with at least one pulsed RF output; and
c.1.a. Radio Frequency (RF) power source(s) with at least one pulsed RF output; and
One or more fast gas switching valve(s) with switching time less than 300 milliseconds.
c.1.b. One or more fast gas switching valve(s) with switching time less than 300 milliseconds.
Note: 3B993.c.1 includes etching by 'radicals', ions, sequential reactions, or non-sequential reaction.
Technical Note: For the purposes of the Note to 3B993.c.1, 'radical' is defined as an atom, molecule, or ion that has an unpaired electron in an open electron shell configuration.
